```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = 'C:/Users/sschm/OneDrive - Helmholtz Zentrum MÃ¼nchen/Manuscript Engrailed/sina_transcriptome/R_En1ko')

library(knitr)
library(readxl)
library(clusterProfiler)
library(enrichplot)
library(devEMF)
library(extrafont)
library(ggplot2)
library(org.Hs.eg.db)
library(rmarkdown)
library(DT)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(gridExtra)
library(kableExtra)
library(biomaRt)
library(ggnewscale)
library(ReactomePA)
library(xlsx)

d <- read.xlsx(file = "results/tables/DEGs_unstim-vs-stim.xlsx", sheetName = "Ctrl_unstim-vs-stim")

gene <- d$symbol
```


# Enriched GO terms 


```{r,echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
try(ego_CC <- enrichGO(gene          = gene,
                
                OrgDb         = org.Hs.eg.db,
                ont           = "CC",
                keyType = "SYMBOL",
                pAdjustMethod = "fdr",
                
                qvalueCutoff  = 0.05,
                readable      = FALSE))
try(ego_BP <- enrichGO(gene          = gene,
                  
                   OrgDb         = org.Hs.eg.db,
                   ont           = "BP",
                   keyType = "SYMBOL",
                   pAdjustMethod = "fdr",
                   
                   qvalueCutoff  = 0.05,
                   readable      = FALSE))
try(ego_MF <- enrichGO(gene          = gene,
                   
                   OrgDb         = org.Hs.eg.db,
                   ont           = "MF",
                   keyType = "SYMBOL",
                   pAdjustMethod = "fdr",
                   
                   qvalueCutoff  = 0.05,
                   readable      = FALSE))
try(ego_ALL <- enrichGO(gene          = gene,
                   
                   OrgDb         = org.Hs.eg.db,
                   ont           = "ALL",
                   keyType = "SYMBOL",
                   pAdjustMethod = "fdr",
                   
                   qvalueCutoff  = 0.05,
                   readable      = FALSE))

write.xlsx(ego_ALL, file = "results/tables/pathways_Ctrl_unstim-vs-stim.xlsx", sheetName = "GO", row.names = FALSE)

```


# Enriched KEGG terms

Gene identifier changed from HGNC symbol to EntrezID
                
```{r,echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
hs <- org.Hs.eg.db
test <- select(hs, 
       keys = gene,
       columns = c("ENTREZID"),
       keytype = "SYMBOL")
geneEntrez <- test$ENTREZID
ekegg <- enrichKEGG(gene         = geneEntrez,
                   pvalueCutoff = 0.05)

write.xlsx(ekegg, file = "results/tables/pathways_Ctrl_unstim-vs-stim.xlsx", sheetName = "KEGG", row.names = FALSE, append = TRUE)
```

Here are the enriched KEGG terms

## Table
```{r,echo = FALSE}
datatable(as.data.frame(ekegg), extensions = c('Buttons', 'FixedColumns'), options = list(dom = 'Bfrtip', buttons = c('csv', 'excel'), autoWidth = TRUE, scrollX = TRUE, fixedColumns = list(rightColumns = 1)))
```

## Dotplot
```{r,echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=5}
dotplot(ekegg, showCategory = 20) + scale_fill_gradientn(name = "p.adjust", colours = c( "red", "blue"))
```

## Treeplot

```{r,echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=15}

p <- treeplot(pairwise_termsim(ekegg), showCategory = 20, cluster.params = list(n = 10)) + scale_color_gradientn(name = "p.adjust", colours = c( "red", "blue"))

p
emf("results/plots/Ctrl_unstim-vs-stim_eKEGG.emf",width = 10, height = 8, coordDPI = 400, family = "Arial") 
p
dev.off()
```

## Emapplot

```{r,echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=30, fig.height=30}
emapplot(pairwise_termsim(ekegg), showCategory = 200) + scale_fill_gradientn(name = "p.adjust", colours = c( "red", "blue"))
```
